trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTAETHERPOT_00493_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>Inscribed upon a metal plate are the words “crystal forge.” While the apparatus does not appear to be damaged, its purpose and usage are not entirely clear...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTAETHERPOT_00493_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Inscribed upon a metal plate are the words “crystal forge.” The apparatus does not appear to be damaged, and it seems simple enough to use─presuming you have sufficient vitiated aether with which to fuel its operation...
